com.example.economicaldiagram

Class DiagramView

  • java.lang.Object
    • SurfaceView
      • com.example.economicaldiagram.DiagramView

  •  class DiagramView
extends SurfaceView
    Custom UI element DiagramView. User can rotate diagram and extract it parts out to the right. Diagram sectors sizes can be changed dynamically and can be returned back. Number of sectors can be any while one sector size can't be less than 0.5% of diagram size. Full diagram size should be 100%. DiagramView takes it's data from Info class.
    Since:
    android 2.3.3
    Version:
    1.00, 13.06.2013
    Author:
    careful7j
